entry.title: Chains are meant to break
entry.summary:
Author: Thehouseknight

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,223Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 14

Summary: “Where is your plus one?” Helena asked, looking around. “Buck,” Eddie replied. “Buck?” “Yes,” Buck said. “I’m Eddie’s plus one.” Buck's fingers intertwined with Eddie’s fingers, and he looked at her with a tense gaze. “I’m Eddie’s boyfriend.”--------Or: Eddie and Buck travel to El Paso for Abuela's birthday celebration. But how will the Diaz parents react when Eddie tells them that he's gay and his boyfriend is Buck?

entry.title: Headaches and Heartbeats: Eddie’s Love for Buck
entry.summary:
Author: bucknroll

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,935Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 15

Summary: It’s about 3am when Buck wakes up, as soon as he wakes up his headache has only gotten worse and can’t see properly. Great, another migraine. Buck carefully gets the blanket off of him and carefully sits up, not a good idea. He gets really dizzy and nearly passes out but manages not to. Buck gets up slowly then uses the rails to support him while he walks down stairs. Buck finally makes it to the bathroom and instantly throws up in the toilet. Once Buck finishes throwing up he sits down on the ground, knowing he is going to throw up again. Buck gets his phone out of his pocket and opens it and presses on Eddie’s contact. It rings for a few seconds before Eddie answers. “Buck, baby. What’s wrong? It’s 3am” Eddie asks, voice a bit raspy since he just woke up. “U-uhm, I think I've got a-a migraine..” Buck says, while sniffling. Or~ Buck sufers from bad migraines, his boyfriend, Eddie helps him.

entry.title: The honesty chair
entry.summary:
Author: Lady_Stardust1979

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,343Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 21

Summary: Buck ignored him, grabbing a chair and placing it so that it was facing the couch. “You won’t talk to me? Fine, but we are going to finally talk about what happened, and if that’s through talking to an inanimate object like we’re 8 years old, then so be it.” Buck huffed, crossing his arms hotly. “But I am fed up with ignoring what happened and walking around each other like we’re walking on eggshells.” “I’m not talking to a chair, Buck.” Eddie shook his head. “Either you talk to me about your feelings, or you talk to a chair about your feelings, but one way or another, we are going to talk about our feelings tonight, Eddie.” Buck countered. _____ OR: what if they reason why that buddie aren't talking in s9 is bc they hooked up when they were roommates and they don't know how to tak or interact together bc of it. Buck, inspired by watching new girl in the middle of the night when he can't sleep forces eddie to face his feelings, queue a love confession

entry.title: through aurora skies
entry.summary:
Author: leia76

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,113Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: “I don’t know how to let you go,” he confesses quietly. “When I know you’ll take all the best parts of me with you.”Eddie’s eyes are wet too, Buck realizes. This is hurting him too. “There are no better or worse parts of you, Buck. There’s just you and— and I like all of you.”In which both Buck and Eddie realize they're in love with eachother before Eddie moves to Texas, but neither of them says anything until it's too late.

entry.title: stay alive, open wide
entry.summary:
Author: dogfishmonger

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 405,025Chapters: 38/40Kudos: 952

Summary: He feels like shit when he's hungry, and he plays better when he's empty. The cold air doesn't touch him as much. The floodlights turn silvery-soft.And he likes eating. Keeps his hands busy, mouth busy, mind busy. Something to chew through, putty in the ears.Go until he can't anymore. Cycle it back out. Be ready.   -- OR: Buck's had on-again, off-again bulimia since he was 14. -- Updates on Wednesdays. Title from Psychic Friend's "We Do Not Belong".

entry.title: one hundred and ninety seven seconds
entry.summary:
Author: madforyou

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,174Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 18

Summary: So really, after all the training, after all the years of call after call and day after day pulling people out of their worst nightmare, he should’ve known. He should’ve known that dead weight doesn’t feel the way living bodies do. That every ounce of it doubles when it’s someone you love. All he can think about is getting Buck back into his arms, keeping him there, holding tight enough as if he can force the life back into him by sheer proximity. The thought of letting the line slip through his fingers feels worse than dying, but he calls for more slack anyway, watching as the distance grows between them. Those were priceless seconds he just wasted, he thinks. He should’ve known better. He should’ve. Fuck. Or,Do you ever wonder what was going on in Eddie's head after Buck was struck by lightning?

entry.title: a ghost in this house
entry.summary:
Author: meriwethersays

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,788Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 170

Summary: “I’m sorry I lied about living in the house,” Buck says, which isn’t the same as apologizing for getting back together with Tommy. “I thought you liked the house.” Eddie’s strangely hurt at the thought that Buck didn’t want to live there. “We have so many good memories there.” Buck looks like Eddie has just grabbed him by the throat and squeezed. “Yeah,” he says, and he’s even hoarse. “Yeah, we have—” He coughs and takes another drink.

entry.title: Happy World Diabetes Day, Buck!
entry.summary:
Author: soulfulstiles

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,400Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 33

Summary: "Is too early," Buck whined, burying his face in Eddie's neck."Agreed," Eddie chuckled, his arm automatically coming up around Buck's back. "But," he yawned and smiled again. "Today is a big day."Buck made an incoherent, confused noise."Happy World Diabetes Day, baby."Buck stilled, his brain taking a moment to process his boyfriend's words. "Today?" he asked, his words muffled from how his lips were pressed into Eddie's skin."Today."OR: Buck celebrates Diabetes Awareness Month, and World Diabetes Day, for the first time.

entry.title: what will it bee, honey?
entry.summary:
Author: jio0021

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,171Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 19

Summary: Seeing dead people was not as interesting as everyone thought. Sure, it was great that he never truly lost someone, it was nice that he didn’t have to wonder what would happen if one of these days he didn’t make it out of a burning building, but ghosts held grudges like nobody’s business, and Buck, well, he was pretty well versed in pissing people off. “I’m going to kill you.” He muttered through gritted teeth. “Already dead, dumbass.” The ghost floating criss-cross applesauce on top of Buck’s chest replied smugly. “But, Adam, how could they never have told us that? Why would you question anything? We're bees. We're the most perfectly functioning society on Earth.” How did he get here? Well.

entry.title: hate me, love me, as long as you think about me
entry.summary:
Author: goforeddie

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,350Chapters: 13/56Kudos: 81

Summary: “What do you have to say after winning tonight? Are the Kings set to a good start of the season?” one of the journalist, Ethan if Eddie recognized his voice correctly, asked.   That fucking 9 million a year contract smile was the first thing Eddie saw. The second was the shine in those baby blues people call his eyes. “Oh, I don’t know…” Evan Buckley said with faux modesty, “I think we’re off to destroy the Stars for the rest of the year, if they play like they did tonight.”   A few chuckles, some flash from the camera and then another question, the same that always comes nowadays, “What about Diaz? Do you think he’ll save that team?”   Buckley rolled his eyes at the question, then looked directly in the camera and said, “I doubt Diaz could save a sinking ship, even if he was made captain,” and then the TV was turned off.   OR : a heated rivalry AU, where the two biggest star of the NHL - who happens to be rivals since their rookie year - eventually get into a sort of... enemies with benefits, then friends, then lovers... or maybe they were always lovers.
